review: These wood screws are a great addition to my collection of tools. The sharp points and deep threads make them easy to install without pre-drilling, which is a big plus. The modified truss head design prevents the screws from stripping easily, even when using a cordless drill. The black phosphate coating looks professional and matches well with my projects. While they might not be the best for outdoor use due to potential rust issues, they are reliable and offer good value for the price. Overall, a solid purchase that meets my needs.
